body:
Comment 10: 
Maybe something was mysteriously unsetting GOROOT in my environment or something...

C:\Go\src\pkg\unicode>go list
unicode

C:\Go\src\pkg\unicode>set GOROOT=

C:\Go\src\pkg\unicode>go list
_/C_/Go/src/pkg/unicode

Even if not having GOROOT set is wrong, I still think the _/E_ thing is a bug, since
that happens regardless of whether GOROOT is set.
